name: Beans Meet Business
description:
Design and operate a coffee shop, in a game a little like Prison Architect / Another Brick in the mall. 

Pre-Alpha Devlog snippet: This game has been on the back burner for a while, I just wrapped up /updated the save system. and changed some of the balancing...

Let me know about any bugs/Unexpected Errors so I can patch them in the next update. Thanks!

By the way, the save system uses your clipboard data So it may prompt you about that.
